SQL.statement: CREATE TABLE employee (id INTEGER NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, bonus DECIMAL(10, 2))
CREATE INDEX emp_name ON employee(name, id)
CREATE INDEX emp_uppername ON employee(UPPER(name), id)
CREATE INDEX emp_comp ON employee(UPPER(name), salary + bonus, id)
create table emp(id int, name varchar(10),salary compensation, bonus compensation)
create index i4_2 on emp(cast(salary as decimal) + 1)
update employee set name = 'A' where id = 3
update emp set name = 'Z' where id = 12
